name: 7.16 "The Cranemakers" Multiple Choice Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 7 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was Carla left in the will?
questions.explanation:
Grandfather Lozupone's lucky quarter.

	It was called his lucky quarter because that was all he had when he came to America. But he eventually struck it rich. However, someone got a hold of his money and squandered it all. So, all that was left was his lucky quarter.

questions.text: Who had never had a vacation in four years?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	Rebecca forced Woody to go on vacation. Woody didn't understand why he couldn't work when he loved his job so much.

questions.text: What did Lilith say upon entering the bar?
questions.correct: "Lay your hands upon me. I am life."
options: "I have created life. I am queen."
"I'm so excited to be a mother soon."
"Touch my belly. Feel the baby within"
questions.explanation:
"Lay your hands upon me. I am life."

	Lilith was excited about being pregnant. She wanted to share the joy with everyone in the bar.

questions.text: Who told Lilith to "get ahold of yourself"?
questions.explanation:
Frasier.

	Frasier was rather embarrassed by Lilith's actions regarding the baby to be. This soon changed however, and he was as excited as she was.

questions.text: Where was Woody supposed to be going?
questions.explanation:
Italy.

	Rebecca arranged for Woody to fly out of Boston to Italy for his vacation. He reluctantly agreed to go.

questions.text: What did Lilith make for Frasier?
questions.explanation:
a shirt.

	It was Lilith's first attempt at a shirt. They had decided they were going to live off the land and make their own clothes from now on.

questions.text: Who wanted to move to the country?
questions.explanation:
Frasier and Lilith.

	Sam suggested they stay in a cabin a friend of his had for a few days to see how they liked living out of civilization. They agreed and went to the cabin where their first problem was starting a fire because neither of them remembered a match.

questions.text: What song did Lilith sing in this episode?
questions.explanation:
"My Funny Valentine".

	Bebe Neuwirth has an amazing voice which the writers of "Cheers" wisely used in a couple different episodes. Lilith was singing to help pass the time while Frasier tried to make fire using two rocks.

questions.text: Where did Woody spend his vacation?
questions.explanation:
the airport.

	Woody missed the plane to Italy. Having no where else to go, he spent his vacation at the airport and loved it. He found out he had time left and said he heard great things about the bus terminal and left again.

Prometheus.

	In Greek mythology, Prometheus was the one who stole the fire from the gods. Lilith was making reference to this when she called Frasier Prometheus because he finally got a spark from the two rocks. She then said, "We haven't actually achieved fire yet". They started talking about city life and decided they missed it and living in the wild was not for them.
